name: Algorithm Alliance
description:
The Less ammo you have the More damage you do. Find and kill the boss ship.

  • WASD - Move Around
  • Mouse Click - Shoot towards pointer
  • E - Drop Ten Bullets
  • LShift - Boost

Borrowed Assets

  • Space Models - https://www.kenney.nl/assets/space-kit
  • Boss Ship Models - https://opengameart.org/content/3d-spaceships-pack
  • Sound Effects - https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
  • Music - https://opengameart.org/content/through-space

* There is currently no end screen, but after you beat the boss you win.
